products.name: Apple Watch
products.description:
Apple Watch Ultra 2 arrives with new S9 SiP, on-device Siri, double-tap gestures, and whopping 3,000 nits brightness
The Apple Watch Ultra 2's display can attain 3,000 nits brightness in harsh sunlight. (Image Source: Apple)The Apple Watch Ultra 2's display can attain 3,000 nits brightness in harsh sunlight. (Image Source: Apple)
Apple took wraps off the new Watch Ultra 2 alongside the new Watch Series 9. The Watch Ultra 2 features several internal upgrades including the new S9 SiP, a larger altitude range, and a 3,000-nit display. The S9 SiP powers several new features such as on-device neural processing with Siri and a new double-tap
